alert.note: Alert for Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Wheatland (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 10 at 7:53PM MDT until April 11 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of central and south central Montana. * WHEN...From Noon to 9 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Highway 191 from Big Timber through Judith Gap. Strong crosswinds will make travel difficult along Interstate 90 from Livingston to Big Timber and roads along the Beartooth Foothills.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution and consider postponing travel until winds subside, or take an alternate route.

area.areaDesc: Judith Gap; Melville Foothills; Northern Park; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Wheatland
